short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: English to Hindi Translator Chrome Extension. Easy tool to translate text to Hindi language.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Hi - My Hindi Translator" translates selected texts, words, phrases and web pages of any languages into the Hindi language. This free English to Hindi translator is very easy to use. For more info see the given screenshots.
